article.title: NIITEK to Provide Husky Mine Detection Systems to Afghanistan
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: NIITEK Incorporated, Dulles, Virginia, recently received a $38 million contract to provide 64 Husky mounted detection systems to be deployed to Afghanistan. The U.S. Army Communications and Electronics Command, Contracting Center, Fort Belvoir, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
